name: Phoenix: Last Hope
description:
By James Senior, Jack Dyson, Jurijs Kurilovs, Michael Waters and Sanny Narugeta

General Overview

In this bullet hell game player will have to fight through hordes of enemies and avoid all incoming projectiles In order to gain the higher score and complete the levels. The player will be able to shoot at the enemies to kill them but if the player is hit by a projectile they will be killed and respawn until they have no lives remaining. As this is a classic arcade Style game, when the player loses all their lives for the first time they will be given the option to continue where they will get three more lives and their current score and multipliers will be reset and they will continue from the point they died. after the player has finished a play through, either by dying or by completing the story they will be given a chance to add their score to a local leader board which lets them compare their current score to previous ones
